Body:
now = mock()
now.year = year
now.month = month
now.day = day
when(nv)._get_datetime().thenReturn(now)
assert nv._get_calver() == f'{year}.{month:02d}.{day:02d}'
verifyStubbedInvocationsAreUsed()
pytest.mark.longgiven(year=st.integers(min_value=1950, max_value=8000), month=st.integers(
    min_value=1, max_value=12), day=st.integers(min_value=1, max_value=31))
